EA STDS 19.description: (Formerly numbered East Asian Languages and Cultures 19.) Seminar, one hour. Discussion of and critical thinking about topics of current intellectual importance, taught by faculty members in their areas of expertise and illuminating many paths of discovery at UCLA. P/NP grading.
EA STDS 19.title: Fiat Lux Freshman Seminars

EA STDS 291A.description: Seminar, three hours. Selected topics on East Asia. May be repeated for credit with topic change. S/U or letter grading.
EA STDS 291A.title: Variable Topics in East Asian Studies

EA STDS 291B.description: Seminar, three hours. Selected topics on East Asia. May be repeated for credit with topic change. S/U or letter grading.
EA STDS 291B.title: Variable Topics in East Asian Studies
